name: Free kick challenge - Copa America 2015 edition
name_original: Free kick challenge - Copa America 2015 edition
description:
What is your favorite team of Copa America? You can choose any team participating in the championship of Copa America in 2015. All the stars - Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Mexico and others!

Defeat the selected enemy and climb up in the rankings! But remember, the other teams will be assisted by the same players as you are. Bring your team to the top of the online rankings!

You have to perform a series of penalties on the goal. Score goals with the standard provisions would interfere with "the wall", the fickle wind, and, of course, agile goalkeeper.

The game has three modes:

- "Copa" - a test for the best. Competition with other players for the title of best team.
- "Training" - oppurtunity to hone your skills.
- "Arcade" - a series of penalty kicks, with your personal record on GAMECENTER.

Features:

* Power-ups to enchance your play!
* Ingame currency and various ways to get it!
* FB login and invite options
* Revard sharing options
